name: Andromeda III
overview: A text adventure where you are the Captain of the starship Andromeda III, with a crew of 20 men and women, you set out from earth to find the secret of the Dawn People. Archeologists and scientists on Earth have discovered that at the dawn of time, travelers from outer space came to earth and left clues to a great secrete, which man has, and is slowly uncovering over the millennia; The Rosetta Stone, Stonehenge, etc. the latest discovery, a stone tablet, tells us how to get to the universe wherein this alien race dwells; the exact coordinates of a black hole situated at the far edges of our galaxy. In the time it has taken you to reach the black hole all but two of your crew members have died through one reason or another. Of those left, one is dying. The other under sedation for space madness. Entering the black hole seems to pull your body to pieces, you pass out to wake in a black void. You check on your other crewmates and find them both dead. You are on your own!
